shri lanka nawika hamudawa wisin jathika nidahas dina samarum uthsawayata samagamiwa jathiya wenuwen pidena wedimura uththamacharaya mewarath nawika hamuda mulasthanaya idiripita pihiti pradipagara parishraye di eeye (04) dina 12.00 payata abhimanawath lesa pawathwana ladi.shri lanka nawika hamudawa wisin nidahas dinaye di sampradayikawa sidu karagena yanu labana charithra widhi atharin itha wadagath charithrayak lesa mema sammana wedi muraya handunwa diya haka.jathika nidahas dinayedi men ma ewani jathika wadagathkamak athi wena yam dinaka di ho rajaya nayakaya wisin niyama karanu labana dinaka di melesa wedimura uththamacharaya nawika hamudawa wisin pawathwanu labayi.prathama wathawata nidahas dinayak wenuwen wedimura uththamacharayak pawathwa aththe 1948 warshaye di wana athara, shri lanka nawika hamudawa wisin eya sidu kota atha. 1949 warshaye di da mema aacharaya pawathwa athi athara, eya sidu kara aththe ewakata nawika hamudawa sathuwa thibu “wijaya” naukawe di ya.nidahas dinayedi madhyahna 12.00 payata wedi mura 25k pawathwanu labana athara, eya mema aachara kramayedi pawathwanu labana uparima aacharaya da we.
